text: 1.6: Mk 11.24; 1 T 2.8Mba Guma, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgɨp anan nzaŋri. Ana Fhe Bakɨme khothɨvi ndɨkndɨk thaneŋ kuegɨp, kha ndɨkndɨgar muuŋ thari, “Ee, Fhe Bakɨme mba bigɨnan nan nɨɨŋgirga o, fhu?” Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mba guma ndɨkndɨga phuniaŋ mbui, ana ndɨkndɨk mbasɨk fara muuŋgi. Bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ana rɨgim, ana phurira shogap, mbur vov, khar zi.
